member.name: CWMO_FLAGS.CWMO_DISPATCH_CALLS
member.summary: Dispatch calls from (default is no call dispatch).

member.name: CWMO_FLAGS.CWMO_DISPATCH_WINDOW_MESSAGES
member.summary: Enable dispatch of window messages from in a ASTA or STA (default in ASTA is no window messages dispatched, default in STA is only a small set of special-cased messages dispatched). The value has no meaning in MTA and is ignored.
